start.text: Do you hear it? The humming. It's in the walls. It's in the water. They're broadcasting thoughts now.

dsm_probe.text: Delusions? DELUSIONS?! I see you have the manual. Turn to page 42. Read what it says about 'Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity'. THAT'S ME.

options.text: It says here that's often psychosomatic.
My god... you're right. The readings are off the charts.

agitated_truth.text: LIES! YOU'RE ONE OF THEM! GET AWAY FROM ME!

calm_lie.text: See? I KNEW IT. Finally, someone awake. Take this, it stops the signals.

end_nervous.text: (The guest returns to muttering at the radiator.)

end_calm.text: Stay vigilant, friend. Watch the frequencies.
